name: DVPN Network
description: The DVPN Network is a revolutionary decentralized virtual private network (VPN) designed to provide an open-source, censorship-resistant, peer-to-peer (P2P) VPN solution. By leveraging blockchain technology and decentralized principles, the DVPN Network aims to ensure global accessibility, privacy, and freedom from censorship. This whitepaper outlines the core features, architecture, and mechanisms of the DVPN Network, demonstrating how it creates a decentralized VPN marketplace where clients bid for node usage.
